title: Rito can we have champion Summoner Icons?
body:
http://grabilla.com/04a06-f8e3a927-078d-422c-8815-e0ae696b8060.png
http://grabilla.com/04a06-56c9981a-f6bc-496a-9228-1c4ea203677c.png

What would your Champ Icon be?

replies.body: I think it would be REALLY cool if you automatically unlocked a champion icon after playing said champion 50 times, a different icon (same but like with a subtle silver border) after playing him 100 times, and another (with like a golden border) for 150 times. The colors of the borders could be really anything not necessarily silver and gold. It would make champion mains really happy I think.

I say to lower the amount, but require that you win games. I don't want people to go into a game then afk, telling us "I don't care about the game, I just want to get the icon." Science, I hated those people in TeamBuilder.

You raise a point, so I have a solution. It simply counts the number of games where you haven't been reported by two people or more. Not only would that be cool for people who main a champion, but it would give an actual incentive for people to not troll (and people would feel like reporting someone actually has an impact). Two birds with one stone.
